item.title: VOTE: Who would you pick to be No. 1 on The Big 15 list for 2025
item.description: The Sarasota Herald-Tribune unveiled its The Big 15 list of the Sarasota-Manatee counties' top college football recruits entering the 2025 high school football season. To see the full listCLICK HERE

item.title: Cardinal Mooney-Aquinas game voted best 2025 matchup to watch
item.description: There are plenty of quality games on the high school football slates this year in Manatee and Sarasota counties. Out of all the games, theHerald-Tribuneselected 14 marquee matchupsfor the 2025 football season, including a couple of preseason classics.

item.title: School board member named new leader at Project Pride SRQ
item.description: Sarasota County School Board member Tom Edwards is stepping into a new spotlight as the next executive director of Project Pride SRQ, a nonprofit that champions LGBTQ+ inclusion and celebrates diversity through high-profile events, community programs and year-round advocacy.

item.title: Rocket launch may be visible in the Sarasota sky. When…
item.description: When rockets launch in Florida, they blast off from NASA's Kennedy Space Center or from Cape Canaveral on the East Coast, about an hour away from the Orlando theme parks.

item.title: Tropical Storm Erin spaghetti models, path. Sarasota…
item.description: Tropical Storm Erinis expected to gradually strengthen Aug. 13 and could become a hurricane by late on Aug. 14, according to the latest advisory from theNational Hurricane Center.

item.title: Trump discusses reclassifying marijuana. Is weed legal…
item.description: PresidentDonald Trumpannounced that his administration is consideringreclassifying marijuanaas a less dangerous drug and will make a decision in the coming weeks.

item.title: Three Claire's locations in the area could shut down in…
item.description: Three Claire's locations in the Sarasota-Bradenton area are at risk of closing following the company's most recent Chapter 11 bankruptcy filing.

item.title: Loud drivers love attention in Sarasota. So let's put cameras on them.
item.description: Living downtown, I have long been annoyed by the sound of cars and motorcycles that areintentionally and illegally too loud.

item.title: Allegiant announces new nonstop flight from SRQ
item.description: The Sarasota Bradenton International Airport announced a new Allegiant flight Tuesday, connecting Sarasota and Rochester, New York, with one-way fares as low as $59. The route is set to begin flying Feb. 13, 2026.
